kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
Shadow root click button
Catenate
kw.msg: ${js} = const el = document.querySelector('[data-testid="shadow-host"]') .shadowRoot.querySelector(`[data-testid="pd-opt-color-Gray"]`); if (el) el.click(); else throw new Error("Color button not found!");
kw.arg: if (el) el.click(); else throw new Error("Color button not found!");
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.
